issues: Total amount ($99,997.07) is suspiciously close to $100,000 threshold but structuring typically involves multiple transactions under $10,000 (not cumulative total)
4 entities with 8 accounts suggests complex layering rather than simple structuring
Precision to the cent ($99,997.07) indicates deliberate avoidance of round numbers, which is structuring behavior but the total amount is unrealistic
12 transactions across 8 accounts may indicate account layering rather than straightforward structuring
suggestions: Adjust total amount to demonstrate multiple $9,999 transactions totaling ~$99,990
Reduce entity count to 1-2 for pure structuring scenario
Simplify to 3-4 accounts with 10-15 small transactions
Add geographic jurisdiction details to show cross-border structuring patterns
